channel.title: Game crash after changing char model 2 or more times.
channel.description: While in game at the start, when switching to multiple char models(2 or more?) Dmp file PRODUCED but I'm blind. [url='https://www.dropbox.com/s/3r807fvg94xbnkx/crash_bms.exe_20150614214609_1.dmp?dl=0']Here is the link to download: [dropbox.com/s/3r807fvg94xbn ... 1.dmp?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/3r807fvg94xbnkx/crash_bms.exe_20150614214609_1.dmp?dl=0)[/url] Examining the dump file it tells me that "The thread tried to read from or write to a virtual address for which it does not have the appropriate access." with exception code 0xC0000005. Blah blah blah you can get my OS version from the dump, its Windows 8.1(6.3.9600) but the dump file reports the wrong version.

item.title: Game crash after changing char model 2 or more times.
item.dc:creator: abc
item.description:
While in game at the start, when switching to multiple char models(2 or more?)
Dmp file PRODUCED but I’m blind.
Here is the link to download: dropbox.com/s/3r807fvg94xbn … 1.dmp?dl=0
Examining the dump file it tells me that “The thread tried to read from or write to a virtual address for which it does not have the appropriate access.” with exception code 0xC0000005.
Blah blah blah you can get my OS version from the dump, its Windows 8.1(6.3.9600) but the dump file reports the wrong version.

Read full topic
item.source: Game crash after changing char model 2 or more times.
